channel.title: Configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Enable display email in FO
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Click on the switch button to enable the display of email in FO The switch button should be blue Click on the button save A message should appear Go to the front office The email should be displayed in the footer Click on the contact us button in the header The email should be displayed in the column

item.title: Disable display email in FO
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Click on the switch button to disable the display of email in FO The switch button should be red Click on the button save A message should appear Go to the front office The email shouldn’t be displayed in the footer Click on the contact us button in the header The email shouldn’t be displayed in the column
